name: Somnography v.0
description:
an entry for dream diary jam 5, created by a team of four over the span of about one month. we intend to release a second version with  additional content at some point in the future.

our lovely team:

ELISE PEGASNOW - music, concept work

(itch.io)

JENN ANGELICTACTICS - art, concept work

(itch.io) | (social media)

FRANZlSKA - spritework, bugtesting, misc. concept work

(itch.io)

ROWAN TOBIAS - coding, spritework, music, concept work

(itch.io) | (social media)

somnography was made using RPGMAKER VX Ace. plugins provided:

Transparent Menu Options  (Melkino)

Ace Menu Engine (Yanfly)

Galv's Region Effects (Galv)

ambient audio and some sfx obtained from zapsplat: free use with credit.

other sfx created with chiptone

SPECIAL THANKS

ConeCvltist - technical help

DDJ discord - general support

Miss Penny the Cat - emotional support
